articles.content:
If Panthers quarterback Bryce Young had any disappointments about Friday nights preseason game, its that he didnt get to stay in long enough.
Thats the word from Panthers coach Frank Reich, who said… [+992 chars]

articles.title: Markgraf out as U.S. Soccer's women's GM after 4 years - theScore
articles.description: Former defender Kate Markgraf has stepped down after four years as general manager of the U.S. women’s national soccer team.Markgraf will continue in a transition role through the end of the month, U.S. Soccer announced Friday.“I am proud of the foundation we…
articles.content:
